item.title: Meet the 2026 stock market. It's the same AI-reliant market of 2025
item.description: Tech's outperformance to start the new year suggests the AI trade still has legs, at least for now.

item.title: Will he stay or will he go? Powell is not saying whether he'll stay on Fed board when chair term ends
item.description: Fed Chair Jay Powell has so far skirted the question of whether he'll stay on with the Fed when his term ends this year.

item.title: Buffett says Berkshire has the best odds of any company for lasting 100 more years as he hands over reins
item.description: Berkshire has "a better chance I think of being here 100 years from now than any company I can think of," Buffett said.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Baidu, Wayfair, Tesla, Taiwan Semiconductor & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in the premarket.
